original_title: SAITM and NFTH to be handed over to Moratuwa Uni. in August
original_body_lines: The South Asian Institute of Technology (SAITM) and the Neville Fernando Teaching Hospital (NFTH) will be handed over to the Faculty of Medicine, University of Moratuwa in August, the President’s Media Division (PMD) reported.
The decision was taken in order to make pre-arrangements for the University of Moratuwa before commencing academic studies in January 2025, according to the PMD.
